faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Questions about the complete billing package.

items.question: Why bundle instead of buying services separately?
items.answer: Three reasons: (1) Cost - bundled pricing is 15-25% less than buying separately. (2) Integration - one vendor means everything works together seamlessly. (3) Accountability - single point of contact, no finger-pointing when something breaks.

items.question: What does the 90-day guarantee cover?
items.answer: Everything. If any part of the billing infrastructure breaks within 90 days of launch, we fix it. No additional cost, no questions. This covers bugs, edge cases, integration issues, anything.

items.question: How long does the complete implementation take?
items.answer: 4-6 weeks from start to production launch. Some phases can run in parallel, and we can adjust timeline based on your urgency.

items.question: What if I already have some billing infrastructure?
items.answer: We build on what you have. The initial audit identifies what exists and what is missing. You only pay for what you need. Complete billing is scoped to your specific situation.

items.question: Do I need my engineering team involved?
items.answer: Minimally. We need a few hours for requirements gathering, access to systems, and a review of the implementation. Your team can focus on product features.

items.question: What if I need changes after the 90 days?
items.answer: We offer ongoing support packages, or your team can take over. The code is documented and tested, so any competent engineer can maintain it.
